XII.i.3.F.4.c
.
Example:  Retroactive Adjustment
Situation
:  The rating activity later grants compensation effective March 16, 2020.  A judgment is final on June 15, 2020.
Action
:  Do not offset any portion of the Veteran’s compensation benefits prior to July 1, 2020, the month following the date the judgment became final.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Prohibition Against Duplication of Benefits
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
